He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep1
programme.desc: Hidden - Puss stumbles upon the legendary hidden city of San Lorenzo, and soon finds himself forced to protect it from thieves.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep2
programme.desc: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail - When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep1
programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep1
programme.desc: Somewhere / Over the Rainbow - Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family hes a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Pawston \ Ruff Day on the Job - Tag wants to bring her new neighbor, Scooch, to the Party in the Tree. But a series of traffic jams make Tag impatient, and she keeps trying to find different ways to get to the party. Thanks to Tags handiness - and one of Lady Lydias hats - they make it to the party just in time. \ Pawstons new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Harmony Harbor - Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, theyre invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep1
programme.desc: Everest Returns - Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yis violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yis music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep2
programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yis magic works, they notice that Everest isnt looking too hot. In fact, hes too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that theyve made over the kids rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep1
programme.desc: Live and let Fly - Hiccup and the gang start a secret club to prepare for the Outcast offensive.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep2
programme.desc: The Iron Gronkle - When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: The Night And the Fury - The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy Dagur!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep1
programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep2
programme.desc: Cat's in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Babys doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep3
programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.desc: Booving In / Sant Oh - Best friends Tip and Oh drive each other crazy when he moves into the human world with her./Oh stirs up trouble when he tries to act like Santa Claus.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep1
programme.desc: Crazy Fast - Turbo must become a hero by saving the city from a menacing tiger beetle, who has challenged him to a race on an insane stunt-filled obstacle course.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep1
programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep1
programme.desc: Little Trouble in Big China - It's the Lunar New Year and Odlulu has accidentally brought a stone dragon to life! Wally and Wenda work with local siblings Li and Liu, members of a dragon dance team, to tame the dragon and keep the celebration from being ruined.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.desc: Castle Calamity - Rori is building a castle with building blocks, which intrigues everyone.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Featherwand - Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Squash - When dad and Uncle Stripe play a game of squash, Bluey and Bingo are in control of their every move, and Bingo proves that big siblings don't always beat little siblings.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hairdressers - During a game of hairdressers, Bluey discovers that big-headed customer Dad has nits! To help treat them Bingo has to find her voice, while Bluey has to find her ears.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Great Book Rescue - Evil Pea takes all the books from the Supermarket. Supertato, Chilli and Carrot try to rescue all the books by using acrobatic skills they learnt from their favourite circus book.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC297
programme.desc: Strickland vs Du Plessis - UFC Middleweight Champion Sean Strickland defends his title against South African contender Dricus Du Plessis in a thrilling showdown at UFC 297. Watch the full championship fight on this episode of Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1802
programme.desc: Flyweight Contenders - The UFCs Womens Flyweight division has long been ruled by Valentina Shevchenko, but new contenders are on the rise. See Casey ONeill, Andrea Lee, Maycee Barber, and more fight their way toward the top of the 125-pound rankings.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 ACROBATICS GOALS - Golazo! 10 of the best volleys & scissor kicks that found the net from the Ligue 1 22/23 season.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC301PantojavsErceg
programme.desc: UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event, and Hall-of-Fame legend Jose Aldo comes out of retirement to face rapidly rising phenom Jonathan Martinez. Plus, Anthony "Lionheart" Smith vs Vitor Petrino and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep21
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Moreno vs. Erceg
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon returns to Mexico City on March 30, and the UFC Fight Night event at Arena CDMX will feature the first Mexican to win a UFC title, as Brandon Moreno faces off with Australian contender Steve Erceg in a matchup expected to shake up the flyweight rankings. Looking to be crowned king for a third time, Moreno will be hungry to deliver a victory to his fans, while Erceg attempts to score the biggest win of his career on the road.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Moreno vs. Erceg

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs. Murphy
programme.desc: Prelims - Top 10 ranked featherweights Josh Emmett and Lerone Murphy clash on April 5th in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the biggest punchers in the sport, Emmett makes his first start since his knockout of Bryce Mitchell in December of 2023 to face off with Manchester, Englands Lerone Murphy, an unbeaten rising star who is coming off back-to-back wins over Edson Barboza and Dan Ige.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Emmett vs. Murphy

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep711
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Loma Lookboonme, Front Row: Tom Aspinall, Take 5: Michael Page, Day One: Jailton Almeida - Loma Lookboonme details her story from Muay Thai fights in rural Thailand to making history as the first Thai fighter in the UFC. We join interim heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall Front Row at Madison Square Garden for Jon Jones versus Stipe Miocic at UFC 309. Welterweight striker Michael Venom Page gives us his top 5 favorite heavy hitters in the UFC. Jailton Almeida walks us through his UFC debut in Day One.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1001VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: At UFC 266, The Ultimate Fighter coaching rivalry between featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski and Brian Ortega came to a head. Relive the action like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC297
programme.desc: Strickland vs Du Plessis - UFC Middleweight Champion Sean Strickland defends his title against South African contender Dricus Du Plessis in a thrilling showdown at UFC 297. Watch the full championship fight on this episode of Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1802
programme.desc: Flyweight Contenders - The UFCs Womens Flyweight division has long been ruled by Valentina Shevchenko, but new contenders are on the rise. See Casey ONeill, Andrea Lee, Maycee Barber, and more fight their way toward the top of the 125-pound rankings.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep711
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Loma Lookboonme, Front Row: Tom Aspinall, Take 5: Michael Page, Day One: Jailton Almeida - Loma Lookboonme details her story from Muay Thai fights in rural Thailand to making history as the first Thai fighter in the UFC. We join interim heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall Front Row at Madison Square Garden for Jon Jones versus Stipe Miocic at UFC 309. Welterweight striker Michael Venom Page gives us his top 5 favorite heavy hitters in the UFC. Jailton Almeida walks us through his UFC debut in Day One.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC301PantojavsErceg
programme.desc: UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event, and Hall-of-Fame legend Jose Aldo comes out of retirement to face rapidly rising phenom Jonathan Martinez. Plus, Anthony "Lionheart" Smith vs Vitor Petrino and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.
